QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_AirTerminalBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all types of air terminals.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total Gross Weight of the object without any add-on parts and not taking into account possible processing features (cut-out's, etc.) or openings and recesses.

QtoDef.Name: TotalSurfaceArea
QtoDef.Definition:
Total surface area of the element.
Concerns the air terminal face plate.
